GOAL FOUND!

Solution

(1,7) -> (2,6)
(2,6) -> (2,5)
(2,5) -> (1,6)
(1,6) -> (1,6)
(1,6) -> (0,6)
(0,6) -> (1,5)
(1,5) -> (2,4)
(2,4) -> (1,3)
(1,3) -> (0,2)
(0,2) -> (1,1)
(1,1) -> (1,2)
(1,2) -> (0,1)
(0,1) -> (0,0)
